(I wasn't on a short vacation, though I was gone.  Had to go into Seattle, Wa 
for some stuff my brother needed for his photography class.  (We went 30 
miles for ONE piece of gray cardboard!).  Didn't get home until 10 Pm or so, 
then I just went to bed.  So I'll be taking back my characters from Yan after 
I speak with him.

Firefox, I was wondering if you were posting damage as if Unitron and 
Firestarter and Vehement were attacking from the outside of the bridge.  
Because they were inside. 

Also, Icedemon, I have no problem with a small personal shield, but if you 
have a TON of shots heading for you, please post damage for them colliding 
with your shield.  Also, post damage for your characters.  I know all of them 
were shot at.

Finally, my personal belief is that that vortex is moding and if it was legal 
every base would have one and shields would be invincible unless taken down 
from the inside of a base, which would be extremely hard and unfair for all)

Thanks,
Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
